fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Train: Your next 2 cards you draw will be an attacking card. [2 uses, 2 Night CD]
- Takedown: Pick a player. Deal a Powerful attack to them. Can only be used after Day 3. [1 use.]
- Challenge: Pick a player. Activate a Duel?! between you two. You will automatically start with 1 point. Can only be used after Day 4. [1 use.]
- Denounce: Put a negative vote on a player during the day. Gains a use for every kill you get. May be used multiple times in a day.  [0 uses]

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You follow all rules from the KA faction post, except hell-bent defense.
- Leader: Your defense cards prioritize attacks.
- Aware: You will know the role of a random Neutral present at the start of the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all Evil Factions and Neutrals that directly oppose your goal.
